cvxpy_sample.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
3 
4 import numpy as np
5 import cvxpy
6 
7 if __name__ == '__main__':
8 
9 
10  # 変数定義
11  A = np.array([[3,2],[2,6]])
12  b = np.array([5,8])
13  c = np.array([2,3])
14  x = cvxpy.Variable(2)
15 
16  # 目的関数
17  objective = cvxpy.Minimize(c.T@x)
18 
19  # 制約式
20  constraints = [A@x >= b, x>=0]
21 
22  # 定式化
23  prob = cvxpy.Problem(objective, constraints)
24 
25  prob.solve()
26 
27  # 結果表示
28  print('\nThe optimal value is ', prob.value)
29  print('\nA solution x is ', x.value)
30  print('\nA dual solution is ', prob.constraints[0].dual_value)
31 
32  pass
